dmca.title: Haircare DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Dear Google,



The following Gmail address is being used to facilitate counterfeit activity
on an illegal website.



I have attached a scan confirming that the website it using a Gmail account
to facilitate illegal trade.



*NOTICE UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY*



In relation to the following* *I have a good faith belief that the website
located at this URL sells, offers for sale, or makes available goods that
are counterfeits of ghd products and infringe Jemella Group Ltd’s (owner of
ghd) intellectual property rights:



URL

Gmail address

www.newghdstock.com

[redacted]@gmail.com



This website has been appearing in Sponsored Links by using prohibited
cloaking activity, this has been reported to the relevant Google team. Can
you also arrange for the removal of this URL from your natural search
results, under our usual DMCA process. The page is using our logo without
our permission (our original content can be found at
www.ghdhair.com
).



In line with the agreed procedure I request that the aforementioned Gmail
address linked to the above website is disabled within 24 hours.



Thanks,



[image: cid:image001.png@01CC0001.A7B75900]





[redacted]

Brand Protection Coordinator
[redacted]@ghdhair.com
011[redacted]
